name: Delivery Address Changes
description: This cluster appears to be related to shipping address management and tracking for online purchases. Users are seeking assistance with setting up, modifying, and tracking their delivery addresses.

name: Product Acquisitions
description: Product Acquisitions Customer Support Cluster providing assistance for purchasing, acquiring, and earning products, as well as order management and product information.

name: Registration Problems
description: This cluster is focused on providing assistance and support for registration-related issues with online platforms or services. Users are seeking help with various problems such as account errors, password issues, delivery address setup, and lost access keys.

name: Invoice and Billing
description: Cluster is related to customer invoice and billing inquiries, with users seeking assistance in locating and viewing specific invoices.

name: Shipping Methods
description: Shipping Options and Delivery Information Cluster. This cluster provides information on shipping methods, delivery periods, and options for domestic and international shipments.

name: Subscription Services
description: This cluster revolves around canceling and terminating subscription services related to corporate newsletters.

name: Customer Support
description: Customer Support Cluster: Providing assistance for various customer inquiries, issues, and concerns related to orders, refunds, account management, and other topics within an online platform.

name: Payment Issues
description: The cluster is related to issues with payment for orders, focusing on providing assistance with understanding and navigating payment options and withdrawal charges.

name: Order Management
description: Order management support cluster for issues related to processing orders, modifying existing orders, cancelling purchases, delivery options, product additions, and general order updates.

name: unknown
description: This cluster appears to be related to customer support for an online ordering system, focusing on canceling orders, payment methods, delivery timelines, and contract fees.

name: Account Setup
description: This cluster appears to be related to customer support queries for different types of accounts (gold, platinum, pro, premium, standard) and account-related issues such as PIN retrieval, password reset, and account deletion.

name: Complaints and Issues
description: This cluster appears to be related to customer complaints and issues with a company regarding reimbursement, compensation, and refunds, indicating a need for assistance in filing consumer claims against the organization.

name: Feedback and Reviews
description: This cluster is about leaving feedback and reviews for products and services offered by a company, with various inquiries related to submitting comments, opinions, and suggestions for improvement.
